Key:
Ohh, this is delicious! Super delicious,
Nii-sama!
Eat a little slower, would you Mana?

How am I supposed to slow down with
this meal? Search and Destroy! I won't
let it get away!
No, no. It's not getting away...

(By strange coincidence, I ended up having
lunch with Mana. Man, she sure can eat a ton.
Not exactly the daintiest portions.)
Mrph! Urgh... It's... stuck...
Gaaaah! Here! Drink this, water!
*gulp, gulp, gulp, gulp*!
Slowly, slowly!!
Pheeeeeew. *pant, pant*...
Are you okay?
Yes. That was embarrassing of me...

(After Mana took one deep breath, she started
wolfing her food down again.)

Man, getting to dine with Nii-sama...
It tastes even freaking sweeter.
Glad to hear you say that.
Okay, for my next course...
...Wha?

(Mana's bright voice made my cheeks twitch
lightly.)
Nii-sama? What's freaking wrong?
No, it's nothing. Don't worry about it.

(Not yet. I should still be fine. I should...
have enough money!)

Mana, do you not normally go out to lunch
with other people?

Hmm. Not much at all. Normally, I have no
freaking clue when I'll be deployed, after all.

Oh, but, but—! I'll always come to eat with
you, Nii-sama!

(I'm becoming more and more aware that
Mana doesn't live like we do. With a normal
life, that is.)

(If that's the case, then maybe it's for the
better if I meddle in her life a bit.)

Well, if it's just a meal, then I'll always
hang out with you.
Really, Nii-sama?! I'm so moved!

(Mana grinned with specks of food around
her mouth. Yup. She's not your typical girl.)

(She reminds me of Tohka and the others. I'd
like for Mana to live a normal life someday.)
Oh, is it all right if I make my next order?
How about we get the check soon?!
